name: RetrieveMindmapNodes
description:
Fetches mind map nodes from a specified board.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of mind map nodes for a specific board in Miro. It supports cursor-based pagination for fetching large sets of nodes incrementally. Requires 'boards:read' scope.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Miro board to retrieve mind map nodes from. Ensure this ID is valid and corresponds to an existing board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve mind map nodes.

parameters.name: max_results_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of mind map nodes to return in a single call. Use it to control data page size.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A string indicating the position in the paginated results to fetch the next set of mind map nodes. Use the value provided in the previous API response to continue fetching additional results.

value_schema.description: Points to the next portion of the results set

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Points to the next portion of the results set

value_schema.description: Points to the next portion of the results set

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve mind map nodes.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve mind map nodes.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
